localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: WellSpeak is a mobile app that helps you to become confident in your English speaking skills. AI and smart algorithms will help you with pronunciation and show how easy it is to speak like a native 😎"
blogPost.body: WellSpeak is a mobile app that helps you to become confident in your English speaking skills. AI and smart algorithms will help you with pronunciation and show how easy it is to speak like a native 😎"
blogPost.title: WellSpeak - Practice your English to speak fluently, easily, confidently
blogPost.author: Pavlo Pedenko

localize.description: WellSpeak是一款移动应用，可以帮助你对自己的英语口语能力充满信心。AI和智能算法将帮助您掌握发音，并向您展示如何轻松地像母语一样说话😎"。
localize.tagline: 练习你的英语，使你能流利、轻松、自信地说话。

localize.description: WellSpeak是一款移動應用，可以幫助你對自己的英語口語能力充滿信心。AI和智能算法將幫助您掌握髮音，並向您展示如何輕鬆地像母語一樣說話😎"。
localize.tagline: 練習你的英語，使你能流利、輕鬆、自信地說話。
